text: Marcela Guerra Castillo (born 7 November 1959) is a Mexican businesswoman and politician.Official biography at marcelaguerra.org, (Spanish) She is a member of the Institutional Revolutionary Party. Guerra Castillo was elected to the Chamber of Deputies in 2021. In 2023, she was elected as President of the Chamber of Deputies. ==References== Category:1959 births Category:Living people Category:Presidents of the Chamber of Deputies (Mexico) Category:People from Monterrey Category:Politicians from Nuevo Le√≥n
title: Marcela Guerra Castillo
